message.title: Cybernow expertise serving seniors
message.description: Cybernow Seniors is a specialized division of Cybernow, a Quebec cybersecurity company. We bring our technical expertise with a human, patient approach adapted to seniors' needs. Your first consultation is free and without commitment.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Solutions adapted to your digital needs

proactiveShield.title: Proactive shield
proactiveShield.description: Our proactive protection service continuously monitors your digital environment. We block threats before they reach your devices and alert you to intrusion attempts.

faq.question: How does monitoring work?
faq.answer: Our system continuously analyzes your device connections to detect any suspicious activity.

faq.question: Can I see blocked threats?
faq.answer: Yes, you receive a detailed monthly report with all blocked intrusion attempts.

privacyConsent.title: Privacy & consents
privacyConsent.shortDescription: We help you manage what is shared.
privacyConsent.description: We assist you in managing your personal data online. Learn to control what you share and with whom.

faq.question: What does the privacy audit include?
faq.answer: We check all your online accounts and show you what information is public or shared.

faq.question: How long does configuration take?
faq.answer: Between 1 to 2 hours depending on the number of accounts to secure.

onlineHelp.title: Online assistance
onlineHelp.description: We assist you in all your daily digital tasks. From online banking to creating secure accounts.

faq.question: Can I trust you with my passwords?
faq.answer: We never store your passwords. We teach you to use a secure manager.

faq.question: Do you help with all banks?
faq.answer: Yes, we know the interfaces of all major Quebec banks.

scamSupport.title: Scam support
scamSupport.description: If you have been a victim or suspect a scam, we analyze the situation and guide you through the protection steps.

faq.question: What to do if I gave my information?
faq.answer: Contact us immediately. We will guide you to secure your accounts urgently.

faq.question: Can we recover lost money?
faq.answer: We assist you in procedures with your bank and competent authorities.

overview.content: CyberNow Seniors is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information collection
collection.content: We only collect information necessary to provide our services: name, phone number, and description of your needs.

usage.title: Data usage
usage.content: Your information is used exclusively to contact you and provide the requested assistance. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
